name: Gregs-sgcraft-stargate-program-nl-explanation
tagline: With this program you can use your Computer (in mc) to control your stargate!
body:
sg = peripheral.find("stargate")
local param1, param2, param3 = os.pullEvent()

e = Main()
-- Dit is het hoofd programa, vanaf hier kun je kiezen waar je heen gaat!

i = Iris()
	i1 = IrisOpen()
		i2 = IrisClosed()
-- Dit is 1 Iris onderdeel met meerdere functies.

d = DialCheck()
	d1 = Idle()
		d2 =- Connected()
-- Dit is het Dial onderdeel, hier kun je zorgen dat hij connect of disconnect.

c = SystemCheck()
-- Hier kun je een systemcheck doen en kijken naar de SG state.

print("Type in the correct password in order to use the program.")
print("Password:")

if read == "StargateCommand" then
e
else
shell.reboot()
end

function Main()
print("Here you can choose the Function you want to use:
print("[1]: Dial, [2]: Iris, [3]: SystemCheck, [4]: Disconnect Stargate")
print()
print("For [1] Type 1")
print("For [2] Type 2")
print("For [3] Type 3")
print("For [4] Type 4")

if read() == "1" then
d
	elseif read() == "2" then
	i
		elseif read() == "3" then
		c
			elseif read() == "4" then
			sg.disconnect()
end

function DialCheck()
if sg.stargateState() == "Idle" then
d1
	elseif sg.stargateState() == "Connected" then
	d2
end

function Idle()
print("Type in the Stargate Address that you are trying to reach.")
sg.dial(read())
sg.closeIris()
sleep(20)
sg.openIris()
e

function Connected()
print("The Stargate is in use, in order to use it you need to disconnect first.")
e

function Iris()
if sg.irisState() == "Opened" then
i1
	elseif sg.irisState() == "Closed" then
	i2
end

function IrisOpen()
print("type close in order to close the Iris, if you do not want to close it type exit")
if read() == "close" then
sg.closeIris()
print("Have a nice day!")
e
	elseif read() == "exit" then 
	print("Okay, your chose Have a nice day!")
	e
end

function IrisClosed()
print("In order to open the Iris type open, if you do not want to open it type exit")
if read() == "open" then
sg.openIris()
print("Have a nice day!")
e
	elseif read() == "exit" then 
	print("Okay, your chose Have a nice day!")
	e
end

function SystemCheck()
print(sg.stargateState)
print(sg.irisState)
print(sg.energieState)

end
end
end
end
end
end
end
